title: プライバシーポリシー | AIアシスタント「Effic」
content:
1. Information to obtain

In this service, our company acquires user information, including personal information, as specified below.

  • Information obtained by users when using this service (audio data, data converted from audio to text, videos, nominations, email addresses, calendar schedules, information entered in chat)

  • Information collected by our company when using this service (device information, usage status of this service)

​

2. purpose of use

Our company will appropriately handle user information obtained through this service within the scope of the following purposes. We will not use your information beyond the intended purpose or provide it to a third party without your consent.

  • To provide, maintain, and improve this service

  • To confirm the user's identity and prevent unauthorized use by third parties

  • To respond to inquiries and complaints, etc.

  • To inform you of new features, update information, campaign information, etc.

  • To create statistical data processed in a format that does not allow identification of specific users.

​

3.Handling of Information in Accordance with Google API Services User Data Policy

Effic's use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google APIs will adhere to Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.

​

4. Disclaimer

  • The Company assumes no responsibility for any actions taken by users using the information provided by this service.

  • The Company shall not be held responsible for any damage caused to the User or damage caused by the User to a third party due to the User's use of the information provided by this Service.

​

5. Copyright/Portrait rights

Text, images, and all content on our website are protected by copyright, portrait rights, etc., and unauthorized use or diversion is prohibited.

​

6. Business information

Corporate name: Root U Co., Ltd.

Address: 2-23-7 Mejiro, Toshima-ku, Tokyo

Representative: Tatsuya Kanto

​

7. Date of enactment

Establishment: 2023October 10th

​

8. contact address

For any questions, concerns, complaints, or other inquiries, please contact Route U Co., Ltd.Inquiry formPlease contact us.
